Python Package Index¶

https://pypi.org/ The Python Package Index (PyPI) is a repository of software for the Python programming language.

PyPI helps you find and install software developed and shared by the Python community.

Packages I Have Used¶

Package Name Category Description
argParse Python core Use to parse arguments in a console application
Sphinx Python standard Originally written for Python itself, Sphinx is the standard documentation engine in the Python community
Menu User Used with console menu creation
